content.question:
Researchers have identified regions, including region A in Figure 1, of the cell membrane that have a different density and composition than the surrounding membrane.

Figure 1. Structure of a portion of the cell membrane

Which of the following best describes the chemical composition of the different types of macromolecules that make up the membrane represented in Figure 1?

choices.label: All the molecules contain carbon and oxygen, but only some contain nitrogen.
All the molecules contain carbon and hydrogen, but only some contain oxygen.
All the molecules contain carbon and oxygen, but only some contain hydrogen.
All the molecules contain carbon and nitrogen, but only some contain oxygen.

content.answer: All the molecules contain carbon and oxygen, but only some contain nitrogen.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
